content.detailedDescription: My father and i were outside looking at the sky talking on the phone to a family member. about 7:25pm i noticed a bright white light moving from the southwest going northeast. at first i thought it was a satellite, possibly the space station. we watched it move slowly across the sky at one point going directly over our heads and our house. as it went further east it never lost it's light. all the other satellites i've ever seen have gotten dimmer as they go away from the sun. this never got dimmer at all. it held it's intensity until it went behind the trees and disappeared. i would like to know if anyone can tell me that this was indeed the space station or some other satellite. i know it wasn't an aiplane because it had no binking or flashing lights at all. also there was no sound at all. we also saw two or three airplanes flying over during the sighting. they all had blinking lights and were obvious airplanes. this was solid white and looked like venus. when the light didn't fade i began to doubt that we were seeing a satellite. i am going to go out again tonight and see if i can see it again. i will have my camera this time.
content.summary: Unknown light

content.detailedDescription:
I was alone lying on the outer edge of the concrete car pad located behind my house facing east.  the moon and a star were visible, the star being slightly below the moon to the right. i was filming the moon. i bought the camera in august which is an hd jvc everio with a 200x digital zoom to shoot the video.
i video taped something very odd which i posted on u-tube.
link:  www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=rlfscew_vd8 
i thought someone from mufon should see this.
i wish to keep my personal information confidential.

information submitted by:
debbie ziegelmeyer
missouri mufon state director
content.summary: Unknown object caught on video near the moon

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend was driving down buttles road in lewiston when she spotted tons of lights going off in the sky randomly in white and red color, she came home and pick me up and drove to the same spot i seen it, there had to be at least 10 to 12 or more lights blinking randomly, i did not hear any engines or antyhing else, so we watched for a couple minutes and left this statred happening around 7 pm ish we came home, i took off to check it out again, as i was driving down the road from my home i started seing the ligths flashing all over blinking simutalslyin all over as i pulled in to side of the road i saw these huge bright yellowish lights appear from nowhere 3 then repetely saw 3 to 8 or 9 at time some moved counter clockwise and some one apeered and the other disaperd within seconds as now i drove across the street to glens market parkingi to get some one else to see the lights one person came and others seen it to to my knowldege 5 peple saw th ligths are more, the did not look like flaris they were everywhere i was shocked, i saw weired theing in the sky but noting quit like this, finally i called my girlfrends mom and sister to see this now its around 8 pm they both saw one to two of the bright yellow lights with the blinking red and mosltey whtie ligths going off int he sky, then about 8 to 10 mins it stopped i looked to see any jet leaveing after words i couldnt see andythin the ligths were moving so fast it couldent be a jet or normal aircraftt thank you
content.summary: There were tons of blinking lights of white and red all over the western sky for an hour.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were walking to the store at around 9:40pm(newyork eastern standard time)
i had just been pointing out to him what i believed to be the crux constellation a few minutes  
earlier so i was still looking in the sky to see if i could point out any more stars when i had noticed these two flashing lights in the sky coming towards us from the distance. the sky was fairly clear no real cloud cover to obstruct my view to much. the lights were traveling fast, silent, and in sync. if it weren't for the great distance in between them i would have believed that they were connected. these were their characteristics: they flew on a straight line meaning side by side and front and back, they flashed in sync, and they traveled at great speeds with no sound. i think it is important for me to note that when we saw them, we saw them coming an angle that would have been on their left side coming toward us. at no time did they rotate positions. as the objects were getting closer to us they had begun to turn toward the right. this next part is a bit hard to explain. when the objects were coming in our direction the were in a front to back kind of formation, where one was in the front and the other was following in a straight line in the back, but when they had begun to turn toward the right it was as if the one in the back swiveled around to the front or as if the one that was in the front had turned on an axis leaving them both side by side traveling away from me. a better way to describe this is if you were to imagine these two lights coming in to view traveling one behind the other from your right side as you stand forward, and then the whole line that they are traveling on turns 180 degrees leaving the two objects to be flying directly away and in front of you. these objects were high in the sky and traveled fast. when i first saw them i had thought they were planes but i almost instantly ruled that out because where i live planes travel through all the time and this object only had one white flashing light no red or green ones and made no sound considering the great amount of speed at which they were traveling. after initially seeing the objects felt a little bit skeptical on wether it was some sort of plane but soon became very excited when i saw and realized that the objects had very un-plane like flight patterns and characteristics. finally i would like to say that i am and was a ufo believer before this incident and that i don't and never will believe that ufos break the laws of physics or do anything that we as humans couldnt do. i believe that the answers lie in our equations and through study we may get to that point to. but mostly it just angers me that these ufos fly over our heads as if we can do nothing about it. it's belittling.
content.summary: i had noticed two separate objects flashing in sync about 200miles away from each other flying on a line as if they were two ends of the same object but they weren't connected even when they turned, as if they were on an axis 1 turned and the other swung

content.detailedDescription:
Looking over to the western sky in chicago at night in april.  i noticed a very small but bright flashing light of colors.  i grabbed my 8mp camera with a 200mm telephoto lens and took a few shots.  i did my best to keep still but maybe the slight shift is me or the object.  either way the color are clear and the shapes are unusual.  didn't seem right to me when i checked these out on the computer.  took me awhile to share but i hope this helps.

in the photo there are two samples of the same image on each photo.  the top left is the original and the close up is about 400% zoom. both are clear and beautiful.
content.summary: Unusual bright flashes of colors

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 6:45 pm at dusk in lc,louisiana my husband and i were in the backyard of our house, when i noticed something moving over the treetops and pointed to my husband, we did not know what it was .  it appeared to be a black object with a tail below , and it was moving sideways slowly.  the tail did not look like typical fire, it was a glowing white substance and it would flow beneath it for a few moments and then disappear.  we watched the object, along with our children  as it sped up slightly and moved toward the east and then disappeared suddenly. we were able to take a few photos and tried to film it , but it did not show up on video.  we thought that it was over , so i went in the house to get my shoes as soon as i went in the house my son called that it was back and i ran back out , my husband said that in the few seconds that i went in the house , he was talking to the kids and then casually looked up in the air and the object was silently hovering directly over him and my stepson, it was so close that he and my son got a pretty detailed look at it and it was definitely a craft of some type, he was shocked and tried to get the camera to take a photo , but oddly the memory card was full( which has never happened) when i got outside it had already begun to move back toward the east and the tail started appearing again.  we watched again for a couple of minutes and it disappeared once again.
a few minutes later we noticed several aircraft (planes) circling our house in an unusual flight pattern, more planes started showing up, i was about to go into my house for a moment and my husband yelled and we all went back to the yard and looked up there was a large white,bright ball of light that was not flashing , just solid, it was moving very fast across the sky, there was a plane behind it trying to keep up and a plane coming from the other direction and then suddenly it grew dim and turned red , then disappeared.  the planes were left flying around as if looking for it. at this time there were about 10 planes in the sky.  we then saw two more "chases" each with a fast moving solid ball of light that disappeared. the planes started to all head south in the direction of the gulf of mexico. once in the house i had my husband and son draw what they saw hovering above them and i have included the drawings, which turned out very similar. 
the strangest part to us is in a matter of seconds after we first watched it disappear, it reappeared over our backyard, like it knew we saw it or something, we live in a large neighborhood with lots of houses, and of course not a word on the news , it's as if we were the only ones that saw it, please report it if you saw this in our area.
content.summary: Witnessed 4 ufo's in under an hour, the first was like a triangle with a tail, that disappeared and then reappeared hovering over my backyard

content.detailedDescription: On 11 october 2010 at approximately 2128hs, went outside into the backyard with the dog so he could do his business and noticed a spherical object in the sky. thought at first it was an airplane, but instantly realized that it wasnt. the object would light up and then the light would go away and then light up again. i would have to describe it similar to that of a lightning bug. as a lightning bug will light up, go dark, move into different area and then light up yet again. knowing this wasnt a bug, nor was it a plane, as it had an erratic flight pattern, and within maybe 2 minutes of seeing the object it just disappeared. also around the same time perhaps 7 days prior we saw an object in the sky approximately 600feet up that was cylindrical in shape, with one light on each end that appeared to be almost as if it were slithering as though it were a snake. it lasted about 5 minutes til we could no longer see it due to a wooded area near our home. both occurances were at our home and were observed from the backyard.
content.summary: Spherical object emitting light in spurts/cylindrical object

content.detailedDescription: Was on my way to work on september 8 at 7:30 am when i noticed a shiny ball like object in the sky (i thought was ahead of me). i keep a video recorder in my car all the time and took a video of the object while driving.  i was in shock when i looked at the video the other day.  as i continued to shoot at the object 3 to 4 more appear in the frame but i never saw them while shooting the video because they were over the roof of my truck.  so when i looked at the footage i couldn't believe what i saw.  the first object would kind of blip out and then show up again all the while the other 4 stayed in frame and noticeable.  then the one at the bottom of the triangle does the same thing.  i have a dark gray plastic dashboard so i have ruled out a reflection.
content.summary: Going to work and noticed shiny ball like objects.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my daughters dance.  i was staring off into the sky when i saw a bright light in the sky to my left. it fell slighty and seperated into 3 smaller bright lights.  the lights formed a triangle and then instantly vanished.  i thought i was crazy and got a little scared so i looked over there again and the same thign happened again.  i tried to logically explain thsi to myself as i am not a believer in this stuff.  it was too high in the sky to be a plane and it was too bright and uniform to be a meteor.  it looked like a firework but it was in the outer atmosphere.  i can't wxplain what i saw and i was hoping someone else could logically justify this to me.  please. !!!
content.summary: Large yellow/orange light in sky that seperated into three in the form of a triangle

content.detailedDescription: So last night, i was with a couple of friends were on a cruise on some country roads while it was raining (around 52 and ridge) and the rain transcended into a crazy, blinding, downpour with some hail, crazy lightening, thunder, the works. it was so frightening we contemplated pulling over, and then fact that we might be about to cross paths with a tornado (there wasnt much wind, looking back on the situation, but this was how severe it was), then out of no where the sky flashed a brilliant, almost neon- electric blue, with no trail of source. it happened maybe 3 times, and was terrifying to the core. the light, and color of it did not seem natural. a couple of us were asking out loud what that was.  anyway, survival mode kicked in, and we booked it. first instinct for all of us, was that it was that color could not have been produced by nature, but no one wanted to say anything. my friend described it as it being like "someone was taking a picture of the whole world" if the persons flash had a blue covering. what's weird is that in town, approx 10 minutes from where we witnessed the flashing, the storm had not raise remotely any alarm. now this was the same storm that terrified us to the point where we thought we were going to die. we were shaking a solid two hours after the incident, reflecting on how engaging the light was and how we never felt that feeling of sheer terror before, not knowing what was coming our way.
content.summary: Brilliant neon blue flash taking up whole night sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were down from oregon for my sisters wedding in tuscon arizona on saturday the 16th of october 2010. sunday the 17th we drove out to tombstone where they just by chance for us were having helldorado days which was a lot of fun.

as we were leaving tombstone we stopped at boot hill cemetery just at the north end of town. after walking through the cemetery my wife and i were about to get into the car. i looked out over the road (hwy 80) toward the west to take in the scenery out over the desert. that's when i noticed something just hanging there maybe a mile or 1.5 miles high and about 3 miles total distance. it hovered and did not appear to move. it was a little difficult to see with the sun facing me at about 2 o'clock with the object to the left at 9 or 10 o'clock. at first i considered it could be a hot air balloon but i quickly ruled that out. i thought the sun could be reflecting off of something but that would mean there had to be something there to reflect off of. 

with the naked eye i could see the dark area on the left and the bright white vertical boomerang shape on the right. i grabbed my camera and took about four pictures, the one i posted is the best image. these images were able to provide much more detail than i could see otherwise.

my wife also could see the object as well. with no nearby roads leading out to the object and not knowing what it was we decided to leave after watching it for about ten minutes. during that time it did not appear to move, if anything it got a little closer.
content.summary: Tombstone az -  hovering white boomerange with dark oval shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a party in a little playground taking pictures, the sky was so clear, blu a lot of  aircrafts and jets were crsossing the sky on one airport aproaching wway. then i want to take pictures of these airjets, then i saw a silver flying object in straight line corssing very high.
i toke the camera and use the zoom to take pictures of it.

thats is it, i try to take more and nore pictures but i loose the vision because the roof cover my camera and i cant get out to take more picutres because i was in a kids party.

thank you

i want to know i this pictures area a real ufo or are a ballon. but i have my doubrts beciuase this object has a very straight way across the sky i think a ballon maybe has other kind of movements.

mexico city
saturday
content.summary: Clear sky one silver ufo object

content.detailedDescription: I had just taken the trash out to the alley behind my home when i turned to go back to the house, in the south east sky was 2 bright stars about 35 degrees high in the sky. they were very bright with one slighty lower and to the right of the other. i thought wow i don't remember those 2 stars in the sky before. by the time i got to the side of my house, which is about a 100 foot walk, they were gone. i thought maybe a cloud had blocked them so i went back to the alley and they were still not in the sky. there are no clouds around to block them out.
content.summary: 2 "stars" in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving east on md rt 100 right before the exit for 95. i noticed in the clear sky that there was smoke in a weird pattern. it was almost like somebody drew it in the sky. a couple seconds later i notice a strange object not moving at all. it looked just like those videos of "ufo's" that people capture all the time. it was so far away so it was really difficult to tell exactly what shape it was. i told the driver of the car to look at it, and he noticed that the person driving next to us was staring at it too. i expected to see something on the news about it, but i haven't heard anything and that's actually how i ended up on this website. there was no way this was a plane or helicopter or something that i see every single day. when we got the exit for 95 and started heading north, i couldn't see it anymore beyond the trees. i don't believe in any of this stuff, and still am having trouble believing myself that it wasn't something regular. i just thought i'd post in hopes of someone else seeing what i saw.  i drew on paintbrush to the best of my ability of what i saw.
content.summary: Strange smoke and strange object

content.detailedDescription: This is the fouth attempt to write my story. for some reason my  computer keeps erasng it. anyhow i was coming home from work , noticed light in the sky. noticed it was getting closer and larger. realized it was following me. it passed directly over my head at tree top level. it had red and white lights on it. its belly was of differnet designs and there was no sound. the circcular disk was the only thing spinning on the craft. i would tell you more but this computer is acting up. also i have had two dreams that i was aboard a space craft, they told me why they come and showed me the craft.Red and white lights
content.summary: Circular disk with red and white lights

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out on my back porch to drink my morning coffee of which i always do every day just to take in a bit of the morning sun. i always look up to the sky just to observe the sparrows in the trees and the honkers of which there are a lot of this time of year. as i scanned the blue sky i noticed a bright white object coming from north and heading south. i immediately thought "how strange this object looked".  it was a bright white yet transparent looking object. the front and back were rounded just like a long tube. there was a slight discoloration (slightly darker than the bright white/transparent color of the rest of the object) in the middle which gave it the appearance of a band around it. i listened for "sound" but heard none but i also know that you can't always hear a planes engine until they have passed over you somewhat. i learned this because i see a lot of commercial airliners. i knew immediately this object was different because i couldn't see any wings, tail, windows, or a jet stream. it also seemed to move with more ease like it was gliding. i can't explain why i felt that way except maybe because there was no sound. i remembered my camera was on the table so i ran in the house and grabbed it (coincidently it was sitting on my kitchen table because i had been loading my vacation pics into my laptop that morning!) when i got back out on the porch, less than 10 seconds, i noticed it had moved very fast and my nerves kicked in. i felt i needed to just start snapping photo's or else i was going to lose it. i snapped only 3 frames before it was out of sight. i only caught one good enough to show what i saw and i am pleased. i listened for the "sound" again but heard nothing. it seemed to be heading south but also "up" and it disappeared rather into the high sky before i could blink.
content.summary: White cylinder with indentation in middle (like a cigar w/band in middle)

content.detailedDescription: I was looking east last night because the moon was yellowish-orange, then i started lookin west above the treeline towards the city of mounds around 9:30 pm- it was kinda cloudy but the clouds went away and the i noticed 2 red light close together just sittin there in the sky, so i ran inside got the binoculars i watched it for 10 min.. then it took off fast ,but what was really strange 2 more just like it came out of nowhere and followed it really fast!!.It was not loud like a airforce plane- i didnt here any noises at all!!! something is going on in the dark skies and its really got me freaked out!!!!
content.summary: 2 red lights

content.detailedDescription:
At around 7:50pm est this evening, friday october 22nd 2010, i was driving north on 93, just north of manchester, nh. above the toll gate, but just south of the nh liquor store. i saw what i thought were fireflies in the sky, maybe 100 ft above the freeway ahead. as i approached the firefly like lights, i looked up and saw a triangular shaped craft travelling about the speed of a helicopter headed south over the freeway passing directly over me. it was dark and unlit, but clearly triangular in shape and with 3 funnels hanging from its underside - kind of like the thrusters at the bottom of the space shuttle. i only saw the underside of this object, and swerved my car all over the road as i looked up in amazement. 
 
about 2 minutes after this, i pulled over at the nh liquor store and drew a diagram of what i just seen, and wrote a description (i wanted to capture this bizarre event while it was still fresh in my mind). while i only saw this for a second or two, i got a really close look at the funnels on the underside. it was a similar view to one you might see at a major airport when a large jet is landing ��� i could clearly see the underside of the object, but it was nothing like any plane i have ever seen. there were no lights, and while i had a close up view, it was only for 1 or 2 seconds.
content.summary: Dark, close up view of the underside of a triangular ufo

content.detailedDescription:
The star shape was silvery with whitish firey from its rear.
it zipped like being unzipped from a gladbag- or children's toys
toppling out- or maybe like darkness-unzipping and out pops the star-
as it tripped like it was hopping down 2 stairs at a time....
i was visiting some friends as i stopped on a country road as i enjoy
observing the stars,when over in this beautiful sunol area.
and all of a sudden this star just peeked out from nowhere, 8:30-8:40 pm on oct 13,2010. wow! how colorful! as it swept quickly into the vargas
mountainside and disappeared. i waited a little longer to see if
another one was coming, but none did. the sky was clear, there were no clouds. the temperature was warm enough that you did not need a jacket.
if you were on highway 680- you would have seen it from the angle of
driving southbound to san jose along the pleasanton, sunol area-
and it seemed to just appear as if unzipped from something-not like
other shooting stars i have seen over the years.
if i had to describe an angle- then it would be difficult,as t was
falling like steps.... i would better describe it as time on a clock.
it fell at 1:15, lowering at 3:15, lowering at4:15 then out of sight...

i just stopped my car, and notice the stars on this small road.
i enjoy the fresh air and the breezes, and the night sounds.
i have no idea what it could have been, but i figure'd i'd put
the information here, maybe someone else might have seen it too.

the star was a white vibrant-all through and through-with the silvery
look, that carried an interesting whitish fire behind it-and it seemed
much larger than other stars i have seen. about 10x larger than other
stars that zip across the skies through the night skies.......
content.summary: Star in shape with  silver flowing whitish firey from its rear

content.detailedDescription:
This occured in oklahoma city on 10/24/2010 at 9:20 pm. my wife and i were sitting in our hot tub (with the jets off) in silence when a white/ silver looking boomerang craft flew right towards us and directly over our heads. i spotted it coming at us and told my wife to look, which she immediately did. the craft was approx 80' to 100' feet above us, approx 30' wide and 20' in depth, and was completely silent the entire time. it was moving at a slow rate of speed (approx 25 mph) and we watched it go in a straight line past us for approx. 400' when it started to turn sharp right and then totally disappeared. it was not too far from us to go out of sight, but simply just vanished. the moon was almost full and visability was good as there was no clouds at all. there is no doubt in our minds at all that this was a ufo. it could not have been anything else. 

i have seen a ufo close up before many years ago and know they exist and my wife did not believe in them at all, until now. she always laughed at my story from the past and it was great that she now knows they do exist. 

please contact me if you have any questions. attached is a web link we found that shows exactly the same craft that we saw.

http://lightsinthetexassky.Blogspot.Com/2010/04/cloud-disguised-boomerang-shaped-ufo.Html
content.summary: Small white/silver boomerang craft observed at close range

content.detailedDescription:
Camping in the sierras, had finished breakfast and stood to look west into the canyon. i was looking for weather moving in, and the sky was clear. i saw what i thought was a balloon at first glance, but realized was something much bigger at higher altitude. as it passed behind a mountain i realized how large it was and how fast it was moving. it was moving perpendicular to the prevailing winds in the area, from north to south. i saw it for 3-4 seconds before it passed behind the mountain. i was around 8000' elevation. the object would have been in the morning sun, so i can't be sure it was white. it may have been reflective. it was shaped sort of like an oval, but flatter on the bottom and more domed on top. there were no other details i could see, and it moved along a straight line to the south. 
i'm not sure if this is anything interesting or not, as a large balloon could move quite fast at that altitude. but the object appeared rigid and symmetrical. i've never seen a ufo, and don't really know if this was one. i'm also a licensed pilot, although not current. i was on family property, a place i've been frequenting almost every year for the past 40+. 
also worth mention, the weather patterns up there last week were all over the place. we saw rain and hail, some snow, and systems were approaching from the east and west alternatively. i can only comment on the winds in the canyon, which can only go in those directions. winds aloft, i have no idea on that day. but my estimate of the object's altitude is around 15,000 - 20,000 feet based on the mountain it passed and the fact that i am very near it's base. the minimum altitude it could have been would be (in my opinion) 10,000-11,000 feet to clear the low parts of the surrounding terrain. even at that low altitude, the object would still have been approximately the size of a house or larger, possibly a large building. 
it appeared smooth on the outside and didn't "light up" or anything. in my opinion, the object had to be moving several hundred knots. it never wavered from its course in the brief 3-4 seconds i watched it.
i mentioned it to two other people, who thought i was messing around. they are both california highway patrolmen who were also there, but did not see anything and were not outside when i saw it.
content.summary: Saw large white(?) object moving very fast pass behind a mountain

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting:


around 19:30 in the evening i was in front of the internet cafe "cyber zone"  in north phoenix having a cigarette. i noticed in the sky 2 objects that were trailing fire behind them. they appeared to be descending from space in the thermosphere down into the troposphere. as they were falling there was an audible noise unlike other conventional general aviation aircraft. it was a deep loud rumble. the color of the flames was a golden and white mixture and was very brilliant. after what was about 25 seconds of falling time, the 2 objects leveled out their altitude at about a 20 degree angle off of the horizon while turning to the right. when level the appeared to morph into each there own oval shape. they then began to hold there elevation while traversing the sky, left to right, and then back from right to left, all the while still trailing a flame behind then as they moved. they continued this activity for two and a half minutes before they disappeared and what i would call there corona stopped burning. (2 others witnessed this event with me including the owner of the cafe and his wife.)


my feelings:


when i first saw the objects falling, i was trying to process what they could possibly be with deduction from my personal knowledge and life experience. i have seen meteor showers many times in arizona before. i am also hold an faa private pilot certificate and have served in the marine corps and have seen all different types of military aircraft. i have also viewed missiles launched from white sands missile range in new mexico that were viewable from arizona in the past. this is my third sighting in phoenix and the most amazing. i believe that whatever i witnessed that night was operated with intelligent control.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Star-like
content.summary: 2 ufos trailing flames drop down from the upper atsmosphere

content.detailedDescription: Since october 2 i have been seeing ufo activity during daylight hours and i aam a truck driver and they are following me and have been visited by them and torcherd by them for for22 days and it is getting to be a unplesant event i had a very good picture of one but was torcherd to get rid of it i have activity in the house i beleave but not for sure that there is one inside of me these are sadow people pull the hard drive one my computer and do a picture restore and you will see the activity in the house the picture of the ufo was on my cell phone  ihave so much more to tell but have nobody that will really listen to what ihave to say my mother my wife think i crasy but i know the diiference between reailty and drems  i need help please contact me
content.summary: Lights lime green straihgt line bright  seeing stars during daylight hours

content.detailedDescription: I'm currently sitting outside with my laptop watching the object hovering at what seems like a long distance, maybe 1000ft or more. its a triangle in shape and has green running light on the side or bottom(cant tell).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright white light emmited from the front, green slowly flashing lights around bottom

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i stepped out on the deck to star gaze being the first totally clear night we have had in awhile.  before we came in i noticed a very bright "star" (was exactly what it looked like) zooming across the night sky.  was too slow to be a shooting star, but was only one solid light, so couldn't have been an airplane or helicopter of any kind.  i pointed it out to my husband, and he said he thought it might be the space station.  i went inside and looked it up to see where it was and how fast they moved.  found that it was moving way too fast to be the space station.  we went back outside and it was gone, which we expected.  but we then noticed that in the north, there was another "star like" something hovering too high to be a helicopter.  it seemed to flash red occassionally, but mostly just stayed bright white.  it looked like it would be getting closer, then would start to get further away again.  seemed to be attracting quite a bit of air traffic attention as well.  saw several planes circling around it that were definitely not commercial airliners, going too fast, maybe not jets, but not airliners.  it is still out there and will be keeping an eye on it.  hoping someone else will see this too as clear as it is tonight.
content.summary: Bright like a star but occassionally flashing red/white lights

content.detailedDescription:
Started  a few weeks ago and has continued every night within a five mile radius of  my sister's  home.  i am reporting this for her as i can also view it from my home . nightly a light lower on the horizon appears around 7:30ish and seems to flash vibrantly and for hours. at times it will resemble the flashes that are present when a photo is taken and at other times you can see an orange and red pinpoint of light from it. 
at times it appears that another light source will orbit or rotate the light . sometimes it appears that it has morphed into two lights very close together then quickly goes back to the  single sparkling light. 
it will power up very brightly at times and then diminish to a small light the next second. at times it will move quickly in a jerking fashion either up or down or appear to bounce around inside an imaginary box of sorts. its location appears within the same general area nightly for 3 weeks now . when an attempt was made to photograph it  new batteries would go dead and it would not appear  through the camera's view finder. 
never seems to leave the  one particular area of the sky, near the airport and last friday on a very foggy night it was the only star that was actually viewable in the sky.  seems to be  a nightly sighting !
content.summary: Past 3 weeks same bright light with flashes of orange,mves radically up and down ,smaller loght rotates it at times.Bright flashes and seems to powers up and dims out.

content.detailedDescription: I was out behind my home when i notice a large slow moving object approaching from the west. it immediately caught my attention because of the size and speed. once the object passed the moon i realized it was actually two separate objects. the one in front was a large spherical amber colored orb. the second was two pulsating red orbs flying below the first at a 45 degree angle. they appeared to be no more than 30 feet apart. they appeared to be at an altitude less than 1000 feet. they were totally silent and slowly changed direction making an arching path passed my house. they then proceeded in a north west direction. once the objects were passed my location, the red orbs climbed evenly with the amber orb. they then kept this formation until out of sight.
content.summary: Three spherical objects flying low, silent and in very close in proximity to one another

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our way to church this morning at approximately 10:35 a.M. and all of a sudden we saw a bright light shoot up to the sky going from east to west on nix street, which is just off beltline road.  the best way i can describe the light is that it had a long tail with blue and red lights.  we saw it shoot up into the sky at superfast speed.  then, with the same speed it disappeared into the sky, leaving no trail behind.  this happened between carrollton and farmers branch, texas.  i had never experienced anything like it.  my husband and i both saw it and we have been thinking about it all day.  at first we thought it could be a shooting star but this was shooting up not down. could it be a ufo?
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Unidentified sighting over carrollton, texas

content.detailedDescription:
Just trying to take close pictures of the moon.

i was in my back yard.  

didn't notice the object(s) at all. 

stars? planets?  it just does not look like they are.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the moon this early morning and these two objects appeard there.  i didnt' see them at the time of taking the pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was out side letting my 2 dogs in brutius and sammy. next thing you know i see a circular shape in the sky with blue, yellow and red lights but the yellow one was a spotlight in the center. also i noticed the shape was going in a curved sort of direction so i screamed for my father and next thing you know it dissapierd behind the guys across the streets house but way off near the woods. that's what i saw and am still wondering what it is.
content.summary: Circle shape,red,blue lights, yellow spotlight, tiles from what i saw, lights were not blinking
